text: FIFA 97 is a 1996 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Canada and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation, Sega Saturn, Mega Drive, Super Nintendo, Game Boy and Microsoft Windows. title: FIFA 97
